t: Psalm 45
A Song Celebrating the King’s Marriage.
For the choir director; according to the Shoshannim. A Maskil of the sons of Korah. A Song of Love.
My*pn heart overflows with a good theme; I*ln address my verses to the King; My*ln tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
You*ln are fairer than the sons of men; Grace*ln is poured upon Your lips; Therefore*ln God has blessed You forever.
Gird*ln Your sword on Your*i thigh, O Mighty One, In*iln Your splendor and Your majesty!
And*ln in Your majesty ride on victoriously, For*ln the cause of truth and meekness and*i righteousness; Let*ln Your right hand teach You awesome things.
Your*ln arrows are sharp; The*ln peoples fall under You; Your*iln arrows*i are*i in the heart of the King’s enemies.
Your*ln throne, O God, is forever and ever; A*ln scepter of uprightness is the scepter of Your kingdom.
You*ln have loved righteousness and hated wickedness; Therefore*ln God, Your God, has anointed You With*ln the oil of joy above Your fellows.
All*ln Your garments are fragrant*i with*i myrrh and aloes and*i cassia; Out*ln of ivory palaces stringed instruments have made You glad.
Kings’*ln daughters are among Your noble ladies; At*ln Your right hand stands the queen in gold from Ophir.
Listen,*ln O daughter, give attention and incline your ear: Forget*ln your people and your father’s house;
Then*ln the King will desire your beauty. Because*ln He is your Lord, bow down to Him.
The*ln daughter of Tyre will*i come*i with a gift; The*ln rich among the people will seek your favor.
The*ln King’s daughter is all glorious within; Her*ln clothing is interwoven with gold.
She*ln will be led to the King in embroidered work; The*ln virgins, her companions who follow her, Will*ln be brought to You.
They*ln will be led forth with gladness and rejoicing; They*ln will enter into the King’s palace.
In*ln place of your fathers will be your sons; You*ln shall make them princes in all the earth.
I*ln will cause Your name to be remembered in all generations; Therefore*ln the peoples will give You thanks forever and ever.
